body:
Hi Randolph,


MGF requires that identifiers begin with a letter, and they can't  
contain spaces.  The rad2mgf program doesn't check to make sure  
identifiers are legal in MGF, so this is the problem.  You need to  
rename material and modifier names that don't begin with a letter, or  
I need to update rad2mgf to fix identifiers.


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2010-June/006957.html).</sup>
